main event: Two observers sighted three steady lights in the night sky, which eventually faded out.
interesting points: One observer was in an aircraft and the other was on the ground,Both observers tracked the object moving horizontally north-west for about ninety seconds,The lights were larger than stars and described as white,There was good visibility during the observation,The sighting was recorded in a Project Blue Book document.
sighted object: three steady white lights in the sky
witness description: one observer in an aircraft and another observer on the ground
